string.text:
Coca-Cola, informally known as Coke, is a carbonated soft drink. Originally marketed as a temperance drink and intended as a patent medicine. Some traders around the Zone occasionaly import a few bottles. While most stalkers enjoy it as a drink, it can also be used as a way to remove rust from old weapons.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable

Chateau Latour is one of the oldest continuous Bordeaux wine-producing properties. It is renowned for being a "Premier Grand Cru Classe". The composition of grape varieties is 80% Cabernet Sauvignon, 18% Merlot, and 2% of Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot. Bottles of this wine are quite expensive, it's a real oddity to find one in the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink

 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] strong alcohol

Mountain Dew, often abbreviated as Mtn Dew, is a citrus-flavored, caffeinated soda marketed by the PepsiCo Group. It is a fruit-flavored soft drink initially marketed as an “energy” drink but has since evolved to be more soda.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source

Nestea is a refreshing non-carbonated lemon flavoured iced tea drink. It is best enjoyed very cold, even though it is hard to achieve in the Zone. It is ideal for the hot summer months.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source

Coca-Cola, informally known as Coke, is a carbonated soft drink. Originally marketed as a temperance drink and intended as a patent medicine. Some traders around the Zone occasionally import a few bottles. While most stalkers enjoy it as a drink, it can also be used as a way to remove rust from old weapons.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:

Sprite is a soft drink made from lemon and lime extracts. Its taste is similar to lemonade.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source

Red Bull is an energy drink to be taken against mental or physical weariness or exhaustion. Red Bull combines two natural substances and important metabolic transmitters - the amino acid taurine and the glucuronolactone - with stimulating caffeine, vitamins and the energy provided by carbohydrates.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source

Bright, bubbly and popular, Fanta is a soft drink first introduced in 1940. Fanta is the second-oldest brand of The Coca-Cola Company.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source

Pepsi is a carbonated soft drink manufactured by PepsiCo. It is the main competitor to Coca-Cola. It is often described as being smooth and sweet, with a moderate cola flavor and moderate bubbles.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source

Perrier is a sugar-free and calorie-free tasty carbonated mineral water. The spring from which Perrier water is sourced is naturally carbonated, but the water and natural carbon dioxide gas are obtained independently. The water is then purified, and during bottling, the carbon dioxide gas is re-added so that the level of carbonation in bottled Perrier matches that of the Vergeze spring.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_green] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source

Carbonated Energy Drink with Taurine, Ginseng, L-Carnitine, Caffeine and B Vitamins with Sugars and Sweetener. It is one of the most popular energy drink around the world. Although, some people dislike it for its chemical-ish taste.

Bavaria 8.6 is a special blond beer with its own distinctive character. A powerful and strong beer with a golden haze, pleasantly sweet and viscous in its aftertaste.

Seven-UP (also called 7UP) is a carbonated soft-drink with a taste of lemon-lime. It's the main competitor to Sprite, another soft-drink. Most enjoyable when drank cold.

 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
